tool.name: TransformationEvaluation
tool.description: Applies a transformation to a range of values
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && #if "out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir out && #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' #if "out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("trafoxml")}' #end if #if len(str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',')) == 0 | tee '$stdout' #end if
## Postprocessing #if "out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("trafoxml")}' '$out' #end if #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.name: in
param.label: Input file containing the transformation description

param.name: max
param.label: Maximum value to transform (if at or below 'min', select a suitable maximum based on the transformation description)

param.name: test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

param.name: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS
param.label: Optional outputs
param.option: out (Output file containing original and transformed values; if empty, output is written to the screen)

data.name: out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: out
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Applies a transformation to a range of values
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/doxygen/release/2.6.0/html/UTILS_TransformationEvaluation.html
